VI.iii.3.A.1.c
.
Claims Involving a Contested Relationship
A contested claim automatically arises if two people
allege to be a deceased Veteran's legal surviving
spouse
mother, or
father,
and
file a formal claim for the same benefit.
Note
:  This principle applies to all claims for which entitlement to VA benefits is based on the claimant's relationship to the Veteran.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section A - General Information on Contested Claims
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section A
